item.title: Donald Trump chooses hedge fund executive Scott Bessent for Treasury secretary
item.description: The founder of Key Square Group was deemed a strong favorite to lead the Treasury Department, along with several other contenders.

item.title: Trump hush money sentencing delayed indefinitely
item.description: A New York judge indefinitely postponed President-elect Donald Trump's sentencing in his criminal hush money case.

item.title: Top 10 S&P 500 stock winners since Election Day
item.description: Policy stances from the incoming Trump administration, bullish quarterly earnings and an "Elon Musk premium" led to lofty stock returns, experts said.
